page.title: 09FLEET JUNIOR'S FAVOURITES
page.content:
{FOOD.}A survey was carried out amongst pupils to find the most popular food. {Chips}and{Beefburgers}were the favourites with{Spaghetti Bolognaise} and{Chinese}food next.Roast dinners were not so popular but{chocolate}in any form was.
{INDOOR GAMES. Cards and computer games were the most popular games.{Snooker, {darts and table-tennis}were next,these are often seen on T.V.{Chess}and {draughts}were not so popular.
{PETS.}The most popular pet was{fish, } with{cats and dogs}coming close. Many pupils keep{rabbits, hampsters and {tortoise.}One pupil had a pet{wood- {louse}and another keeps a{toad}in his garden.
